entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 1:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.2°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
